author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a flaw in the RequestHandler.makeLink method: if any exceptions were thrown while generating the URL, the method proceeded as if nothing was wrong and created an invalid URL. Now the method returns null if any exceptions were thrown - it is up to calling code to decide what to do about it.
This commit also makes use of the new WebSiteProperties class to simplify code and improve performance.

author: adrianc
msg: Added a new class to simplify OFBiz URL generation and eliminate redundant code.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-3201 Redirect after post not possible
Make sure the Location header is set not only for the
201/CREATED status but also for any of the 3xx stati.
